pages.title: Sapphires in the Skyblock
pages.text: The $(item)Amethyst$() you gathered from the $(thing)Nether$(), it's similar in composition to the $(item)Sapphire$() I used to use in my experiments, but it seems almost chaotic in nature. I wonder if that could be tamed with some exposure to the essence of our world - $(item)Liquid Mana$().

pages.heading: Sapphire
pages.description: Consumes 2 bottles of Liquid Mana (1/2 of a bucket)
